sentences.sContent: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.sCn: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.sContent: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.sContent_eng: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance ballet on the volcano.
sentences.sCn: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

trans.tranOther: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net
